entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:50 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -19.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
